name: AttachObjectToPlayer
description: Attach an object to a player.
params_title: (objectid, playerid, Float:OffsetX, Float:OffsetY, Float:OffsetZ, Float:rX, Float:rY, Float:rZ)

params_body.name: objectid
params_body.description: The ID of the object to attach to the player.

params_body.name: playerid
params_body.description: The ID of the player to attach the object to.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetX
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the X direction.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetY
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the Y direction.

params_body.name: Float:OffsetZ
params_body.description: The distance between the player and the object in the Z direction.

params_body.name: Float:RotX
params_body.description: The X rotation between the object and the player.

params_body.name: Float:RotY
params_body.description: The Y rotation between the object and the player.

params_body.name: Float:RotZ
params_body.description: The Z rotation between the object and the player.
